rcpRemoteAddress.name: rcpRemoteAddress
rcpRemoteAddress.description: If a remote console session exists, the Ethernet address of the remote partner, otherwise zero length.

phivPathSelection.name: phivPathSelection
phivPathSelection.description: The algorithm used to balance traffic between equal next hop paths. 'roundRobin' selects the next hop using a round robin algorithm for each hop. 'samePath' selects the next hop guaranteeing that all packets with the same source/destination pair will always use the same next hop.

phivMaxPaths.name: phivMaxPaths
phivMaxPaths.description: The maximum number of equal cost next hops that the router can remember and successfully load balance between.

phivStatus.name: phivStatus
phivStatus.description: The status of the DECnet routing software.

phivCircuitTable.name: phivCircuitTable
phivCircuitTable.description: A list of DECnet circuit entries.

phivCircuitEntry.name: phivCircuitEntry
phivCircuitEntry.description: Parameter values for a DECnet circuit.

xPhivCircuitIndex.name: xPhivCircuitIndex
xPhivCircuitIndex.description: Identification of a circuit entry. Same as an interface index (ifIndex).

phivCircuitRoutingTimer.name: phivCircuitRoutingTimer
phivCircuitRoutingTimer.description: The maximum time in seconds allowed between Routing updates on the circuit. Different values for LANs vs. WANs.

phivCircuitOperCost.name: phivCircuitOperCost
phivCircuitOperCost.description: The actual cost associated with the circuit.

phivCircuitErrors.name: phivCircuitErrors
phivCircuitErrors.description: The number of routed DECnet packets received in error on this circuit.

phivCircuitLastError.name: phivCircuitLastError
phivCircuitLastError.description: The error of the last routed DECnet packet received in error on this circuit.

phivCircuitLastErrorTime.name: phivCircuitLastErrorTime
phivCircuitLastErrorTime.description: The date and time that the last routed DECnet packet was received in error on this circuit.

phivCircuitLastErrorData.name: phivCircuitLastErrorData
phivCircuitLastErrorData.description: The first 22 bytes of the last routed DECnet packet received in error on this circuit.

phivCircuitProtocolPriority.name: phivCircuitProtocolPriority
phivCircuitProtocolPriority.description: The priority at which all DECnet routed packets will be placed on the WAN output queue.

phivCircuitRoutingPriority.name: phivCircuitRoutingPriority
phivCircuitRoutingPriority.description: Router's priority to be designated router on this circuit.

phivCircuitImportTable.name: phivCircuitImportTable
phivCircuitImportTable.description: A list of circuit import filter entries.

phivCircuitImportEntry.name: phivCircuitImportEntry
phivCircuitImportEntry.description: Parameter values for an import filter.

phivCircuitImportIf.name: phivCircuitImportIf
phivCircuitImportIf.description: The interface associated with the import routing filter.

phivCircuitImportAddr.name: phivCircuitImportAddr
phivCircuitImportAddr.description: The address (node or area) to match against learned route entries to decide whether to import the entry to the routing database.

phivCircuitImportMask.name: phivCircuitImportMask
phivCircuitImportMask.description: The mask which is ANDed with the address field as well as the route entries address to determine whether the address matches the route entry.

phivCircuitImportAction.name: phivCircuitImportAction
phivCircuitImportAction.description: The action to take if the address field along with the mask field matches the route entry.

phivCircuitImportStatus.name: phivCircuitImportStatus
phivCircuitImportStatus.description: Setting to 'invalid' removes this import filter from the table. Setting to 'valid' has no effect.

phivCircuitImportAreaTable.name: phivCircuitImportAreaTable
phivCircuitImportAreaTable.description: A list of circuit import area filter entries.

phivCircuitImportAreaEntry.name: phivCircuitImportAreaEntry
phivCircuitImportAreaEntry.description: Parameter values for an import area filter.

phivCircuitImportAreaIf.name: phivCircuitImportAreaIf
phivCircuitImportAreaIf.description: The interface associated with the import area routing filter.

phivCircuitImportAreaAddr.name: phivCircuitImportAreaAddr
phivCircuitImportAreaAddr.description: The address (node or area) to match against learned route entries to decide whether to import the entry to the routing database.

phivCircuitImportAreaMask.name: phivCircuitImportAreaMask
phivCircuitImportAreaMask.description: The mask which is ANDed with the address field as well as the route entries address to determine whether the address matches the route entry.

phivCircuitImportAreaAction.name: phivCircuitImportAreaAction
phivCircuitImportAreaAction.description: The action to take if the address field along with the mask field matches the route entry.

phivCircuitImportAreaStatus.name: phivCircuitImportAreaStatus
phivCircuitImportAreaStatus.description: Setting to 'invalid' removes this import area filter from the table. Setting to 'valid' has no effect.

phivCircuitExportTable.name: phivCircuitExportTable
phivCircuitExportTable.description: A list of circuit export filter entries.

phivCircuitExportEntry.name: phivCircuitExportEntry
phivCircuitExportEntry.description: Parameter values for an export filter.

phivCircuitExportIf.name: phivCircuitExportIf
phivCircuitExportIf.description: The interface associated with the export routing filter.

phivCircuitExportAddr.name: phivCircuitExportAddr
phivCircuitExportAddr.description: The address (node or area) to match against learned route entries to decide whether to export the entry to the routing database.

phivCircuitExportMask.name: phivCircuitExportMask
phivCircuitExportMask.description: The mask which is ANDed with the address field as well as the route entries address to determine whether the address matches the route entry.

phivCircuitExportAction.name: phivCircuitExportAction
phivCircuitExportAction.description: The action to take if the address field along with the mask field matches the route entry.

phivCircuitExportStatus.name: phivCircuitExportStatus
phivCircuitExportStatus.description: Setting to 'invalid' removes this export filter from the table. Setting to 'valid' has no effect.

phivCircuitExportAreaTable.name: phivCircuitExportAreaTable
phivCircuitExportAreaTable.description: A list of circuit export area filter entries.

phivCircuitExportAreaEntry.name: phivCircuitExportAreaEntry
phivCircuitExportAreaEntry.description: Parameter values for an export area filter.

phivCircuitExportAreaIf.name: phivCircuitExportAreaIf
phivCircuitExportAreaIf.description: The interface associated with the export area routing filter.

phivCircuitExportAreaAddr.name: phivCircuitExportAreaAddr
phivCircuitExportAreaAddr.description: The address (node or area) to match against learned route entries to decide whether to export the entry to the routing database.

phivCircuitExportAreaMask.name: phivCircuitExportAreaMask
phivCircuitExportAreaMask.description: The mask which is ANDed with the address field as well as the route entries address to determine whether the address matches the route entry.

phivCircuitExportAreaAction.name: phivCircuitExportAreaAction
phivCircuitExportAreaAction.description: The action to take if the address field along with the mask field matches the route entry.

phivCircuitExportAreaStatus.name: phivCircuitExportAreaStatus
phivCircuitExportAreaStatus.description: Setting to 'invalid' removes this export area filter from the table. Setting to 'valid' has no effect.

phivCircuitFilterTable.name: phivCircuitFilterTable
phivCircuitFilterTable.description: A list of circuit filter entries.

phivCircuitFilterIf.name: phivCircuitFilterIf
phivCircuitFilterIf.description: The interface associated with the filter entry.

phivCircuitFilterDstAddr.name: phivCircuitFilterDstAddr
phivCircuitFilterDstAddr.description: The address (node or area) to match against the destination address of the packet to decide whether to forward the packet.

phivCircuitFilterDstMask.name: phivCircuitFilterDstMask
phivCircuitFilterDstMask.description: The mask which is ANDed with the destination address field and the packet's destination address to determine whether the address matches the packet's address.

phivCircuitFilterSrcAddr.name: phivCircuitFilterSrcAddr
phivCircuitFilterSrcAddr.description: The address (node or area) to match against the source address of the packet to decide whether to forward the packet.

phivCircuitFilterSrcMask.name: phivCircuitFilterSrcMask
phivCircuitFilterSrcMask.description: The mask which is ANDed with the source address field and the packet's source address to determine whether the address matches the packet's address.

phivCircuitFilterAction.name: phivCircuitFilterAction
phivCircuitFilterAction.description: The action to take if the address fields along with the mask fields match the packet.

phivCircuitFilterStatus.name: phivCircuitFilterStatus
phivCircuitFilterStatus.description: Setting to 'invalid' removes this Filter filter from the table. Setting to 'valid' has no effect.

phivTrafficSort.name: phivTrafficSort
phivTrafficSort.description: Setting to 'execute' causes the most recent traffic information to be sorted into the phivTrafficTable. The sorting precedence is: decreasing percentage, increasing destination address, increasing source address, and increasing interface number. Setting to 'ready' has no effect.

phivTrafficTable.name: phivTrafficTable
phivTrafficTable.description: A list of traffic entries, sorted in the order specified by phivTrafficSort.

phivTrafficPercent.name: phivTrafficPercent
phivTrafficPercent.description: The percentage of total traffic that this traffic entry represents, in tenths of a percent.

phivTrafficDst.name: phivTrafficDst
phivTrafficDst.description: The destination to which the traffic entry applies.

phivTrafficSrc.name: phivTrafficSrc
phivTrafficSrc.description: The source to which the traffic entry applies.

phivTrafficIf.name: phivTrafficIf
phivTrafficIf.description: The inbound interface to which the traffic entry applies. This value is the same as IfIndex.
